entry.title: Hello Everyone!
entry.content:
As a working student, most of my time I try to develope myself in branch of the computer security. So far I’m doing it great and lately I decided to share some of my knowledge, opinions and everything else with you dear reader. In advance, I’d like to say that this blog is only my hobby, so you will not experience any adverts here and you can be more than sure that my new posts will be published rather chaotically than regularly. (it’s a question of my free time)

Q: How does this blog work?
A: Each post besides its own tags has one of the five special thumbs, which describes its main topic. Thanks to that, reader without any hesitation can easily open only posts that one is interested in. EXAMPLE: The owl is a guardian for this kind of posts – news :)

Q: Why did you call it a guardian ?
A: Because I liked to ;)

Q: What may I find on that blog?
A:
Forensic Web Security Hardening
News Cryptography


Any questions? Ask me in comments or at fanpage :)
Read Me Soon!
